Here's a few things about Alex Jones that you should know. When people have asked about Jesuit Order he never talks about it. He never has much to say about it and one of the biggest parts of the New World Order comes from that group of people. When he "infiltrated" Bohemian Grove he talks about Molech, a God that is worshiped by those in Skull & Bones. Never does he talk about the statue very near Molech that is actually the God in which they pray to. The truth about Alex Jones is he's not who he says he is. He tells you things that are happening but he's covering up the highest power. If he's so interested in getting out the information, then why won't he talk about the Jesuit order. I like most people started getting information from Alex Jones but then I saw a video trying to show him up. With a little research trying to disprove this little theory I could only find evidence to support it. Alex Jones misinforms his listeners and supporters by leaving out the Jesuit order.
Why does it remain queued???.........

Definetley take everything you hear with a grain of salt, not only is this information possible, but its also plausible, and like the living homer says we may not be hearing the whole truth, if your a dramatic dunderhead and are just in it for the thrill then atleast youll have an idea of whats going on when and if it does, but if youre really interested in this DO YOUR OWN RESEARCH gather info and do what you can to learn about what is really going on, with my limited knowledge on the matter it only seems the right thing to do if the whole world gets in on this, instead of just the US or Romania or w/e it doesnt matter... For all listeners of Alex Jones and Coast to Coast AM, check out the following torrent:

In the 1980s, radio station KABC carried the ground-breaking radio program "OPEN MIND" with host Bill Jenkins.   The subject matter covered included UFOs, alternative energy, spirituality, ancient religions, and more.   Bill Jenkins later went on to host the classic film "THE NAKED TRUTH" with Jordan Maxwell, upon which the current internet hit "ZEITGEIST" is based.

The "Open Mind" radio programs have not been heard in many years ... until now.   We recently came into possession of a large collection of cassette tape recordings which had been made by a loyal listener, and had them digitized into MP3s.  This is a priceless collection of otherwise unattainable radio programs.   It is being freely shared here in an effort to make sure it is not lost to  history.

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4216847/OPEN_MIND_with_Bill_Jenkins_-_Rare_MP3_Collection_-_for_Coast_to
